response.overview: Klaus Barbie was responsible for the torture and deaths of tens of thousands of people. Thanks to the unprecedented work of German historian Peter Hammerschmidt, this film uses exclusive archives to shed new light on the secret history of Klaus Barbie, head of the Gestapo in Lyon in 1943-1944, and the scandalous protections that the German and American secret services provided him with.
response.title: Tracking Down Klaus Barbie
